channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Amazon Japan raided by anti-monopoly authorities

item.title: Perplexity mulls getting into hardware

item.title: Insta360 Ace Pro 2 Review: 8K Action Camera With a Leica Lens
item.description: Insta360’s Ace Pro 2 brings a Leica lens, flip-up screen, and (limited) 8K video to the action camera.

item.title: Transparent's New Wireless Speaker Is a Love Letter to Brutalism

item.title: UK, US retail giants hit by ongoing disruption after ransomware attack on supply chain firm

item.title: Best Portable Charger of 2024: iPhones, iPads, Laptops & More
